channel.title: How do you get a custom title?

item.title: How do you get a custom title?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:15, topic:365187”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=461393.msg3375564#msg3375564 date=1287588899]

Admins can only give them out, and it is only on the rare occasions that a member does something excellent for the site.
[/quote]Do you mean that the MPSC mods had to ask an admin to change theirs?

Global moderators are able to change their own, not others. MSCP moderators ARE Global moderators on moparisthebest.com, so they can do the same, obviously.[/quote]Ah. I wasn’t sure whether you meant that admins were the only ones that could change them or if you meant something else. Thanks for clearing that up.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get a custom title?

item.title: How do you get a custom title?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:13, topic:365187”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=461393.msg3375512#msg3375512 date=1287583439]
Admins can only give them out, and it is only on the rare occasions that a member does something excellent for the site.
[/quote]Do you mean that the MPSC mods had to ask an admin to change theirs?[/quote]

Global moderators are able to change their own, not others. MSCP moderators ARE Global moderators on moparisthebest.com, so they can do the same, obviously.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get a custom title?

item.title: How do you get a custom title?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I’m pretty sure MSCP mods have full profile abilities, including name changes. MDOG would change his name to really long stuff back when he was a mod.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you get a custom title?
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:9, topic:365187”][quote author=casey. link=topic=461393.msg3375430#msg3375430 date=1287570656]
It was originally just for global+, than the admins would change it for elitists, than MSCP Mods must have whined for more power so now they have it.
[/quote]

How exactly does a custom title and avatar give you more power?[/quote]
He probably meant forum permissions.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get a custom title?

item.title: How do you get a custom title?
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Only MoparScape mods, global moderators and admins (although I haven’t seen an admin with one) can have custom titles. I think Community Members have them because they requested for the titles.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get a custom title?

item.title: How do you get a custom title?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

krackkid:

If you mean like above and under your username, you need to be a Veteran(I believe) it mite be for staff/community members only as well.

Vets don’t have access to avatars/custom titles, not sure about CMs though.

Also, certain members have access to them despite not being a staff member, iirc.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get a custom title?

item.title: How do you get a custom title?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“all day, post:2, topic:365187”][quote author=Miles` link=topic=461393.msg3375326#msg3375326 date=1287549832]
? ^ Title ^ ?
[/quote]

Show me an example of a custom title? I’d like to know how I can get an avatar.

The shit-storm is going to start soon in this topic probably, there is probably topics about this everywhere.[/quote]

Only staff members can have avatars unfortunately =/

Read full topic
